title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB:
There are several issues with the dialog details:
- The marking between the button and list is too large.
- The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
- The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection is not allowed. Move up/down can only be applied to one item.
- The signature preview is not wrapping.
- The signature preview does not have the same background color as hover.
EB:
The following improvements are needed for the dialog details:
- Reduce the spacing between the button and list.
- Align the top button with the dialog top.
- Add a label to the table to support mnemonics.
- Allow multiple selection in the list.
- Ensure the signature preview text wraps properly.
- Set the background color of the signature preview to match the hover color.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the modify parameters dialog.
2. Change the name of a parameter to something very long.
3. Observe that the preview of the modified parameter name is cut off.
